text: Hello I'm building a custom card using react and beta dev tool. I need that when a company is added to my deal my card get this update. The only solution I found is make a polling to api to get this updates. Can I use a better and more reactive solution?

Is it possible to get association object's properties as well (i'm currently getting just the id and type)?

Here's my current api definitions
<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/classes?properties=taught_by,subject_name&associations=teachers>
or await HubSpotClient.crm.objects.basicApi.getPage("classes", 10, 100, ["taught_by", "subject_name"], undefined, ["teachers"]);
Is it worth setting up meta conversions API to optimize my ad spending when trying to sell products on HubSpot?
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> what is need mostly is field mapping between thidparty systems and HubSpot Custom Propertiesâ€¦ I think this is available in the App which is developed by HubSpot.
<@U01QVR44MEY> Thanks for mentioning epoch milliseconds, i was otherwise getting unspecified errors. The date is returned as YYYY-MM-DD so I thought that's how it should be used

Hey,
I'm using an api call to fetch all users of a specific team `/settings/v3/users/teams` and yet it doesn't fetch all of the users in the team... am I missing something?

Hello, I am working with the CRM Objects API to update 'Berth Object' schema to exclude the 'Berth Code' property from the searchableProperties and secondaryDisplayProperties. I am unsure as to how to do this as we do not have a designated HubSpot developer any help would be greatly appreciated.
Hey everyone. Does anyone know if there is a way to check via API if an account has leads activated?
i'm getting constant 404 errors when trying to retrieve any documentation for the associations API; is this a known issue?
Not seeing this on my end - can you share a link where you're seeing the issue?

for sure; <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects>

if I type in "Associations" on the search bar and then click a end point I get the 404
and ty

Yup, I'm definitely seeing it when I go through it this way. Thank you for reporting! I'm guessing this has something to do with our new beta docs rollout, I'll alert the team! In the meantime, can you find what you need here? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/crm/associations>
yes! thank you

hey <@UD53A9UUR>, do you know if we have any news on this one? :slightly_smiling_face:

hey guys :wave:

I'm experiencing some weird behaviour from the <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/calls/search> endpoint. Most of the time it works, but sometimes, I get a 401 Unauthorized response with an odd message:

```The OAuth token used to make this call expired 0 second(s) ago.```
What is odd is that the OAuth token works fine most of the time. If it were always failing, then that would make sense, but it mostly works. It only sometimes fails. It also fails for a few different users, but I can't see any pattern or reason why it would fail like this. It is always 0 seconds as well.

I have tried to create a try/catch in which if it fails like this, I will refresh the token and try again. However, it keeps failing again, as well for 0 seconds.

Has anyone seen this before? Any ideas on how to fix it?
that is a great question.  let me look to see if i missed something
i learned something today
we have an endpoint to grab dispositions
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/engagements/get-call-dispositions>
Wow!
I see it's in the legacy docs
Does the endpoint still work?
give it a go and let me know
Will do! :+1:  Thanks Dennis :raised_hands:
sorry that took so long
no worries :wink:
